fields.description: name of the solution to be created. For Microsoft published solution it should be in the format of solutionType(workspaceName). SolutionType part is case sensitive. For third party solution, it can be anything.
fields.name: Name

fields.description: name of the solution to enabled/add. For Microsoft published gallery solution it should be in the format of OMSGallery/<solutionType>. This is case sensitive
fields.name: Product

fields.description: promotionCode, Not really used now, can you left as empty
fields.name: PromotionCode

fields.description: Publisher name. For gallery solution, it is Microsoft.
fields.name: Publisher
